name: Exodum obscuritas
description: Tema personal para el foro exo.do
additional_info:
Hitlario cabrón

PD: Usar con el tema oscuro

<--Versión 2.1-->
Css minificado para carga más rápida
Arreglados pequeños detalles en la página del usuario
<--Versión 2.0-->
Eliminado el botón comunidad porque carece de uso
Color links modificado
Añadida transición 0.5s a los links
<--Versión 1.0-->
Diseño inicial
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("https://exo.do"){html a{transition:all .5s!important;text-decoration:none!important}body,html{color:#005734!important;background:#7c7c6b!important}.footer_copyright,.footer_morecopyright,.footer_time,body a{color:#eee!important}body a:hover{color:#00E388!important}#subject,.textbox{background:#535447!important}.postrow a{color:#00E388!important}.forumdescription,.lastpostdate,.time{color:#bbb!important}.forumrow,.nonsticky,.sticky{background:#535447!important;color:#fff!important;border-bottom:1px solid #214144!important;border-left:1px solid #214144!important;border-right:1px solid #214144!important}.forumhead h2,.posthead,.threadlisthead{border-left:1px solid #214144!important;border-right:1px solid #005734!important;background:#214144!important;background:-moz-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,color-stop(0%,#214144),color-stop(100%,#005734))!important;background:-webkit-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:-ms-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:linear-gradient(to right,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important}#middle_header{background:#214144!important;background:-moz-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,color-stop(0%,#214144),color-stop(100%,#005734))!important;background:-webkit-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:-ms-linear-gradient(left,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important;background:linear-gradient(to right,#214144 0,#005734 100%)!important}.as-tabs dd,.userprof_moduleinactive{border:none!important}.active,.as-tabs dd:hover,.block hr,.inactive a:hover,.selected,.tabslight dd:hover,.usercp_folder-left:hover,.userprof_module{background-color:#214144!important;border:none!important}.navtabs>ul.floatcontainer{background:#2d2d2d!important;border-top:12px solid #7c7c6b!important}#vbtab_forum>a,.blocksubhead{background-color:#2d2d2d!important}#vbtab_forum{display:none!important}#pollresults,.bbcode_container div.bbcode_quote{background:#2d2d2d!important;border:1px solid #535447!important;border-radius:5px}.navtabs>li{border-left:12px solid #7c7c6b!important}#top_header .globalsearch,#userinfoblock,.activitybit,.pagination span a{background:#535447!important;border:1px solid #7c7c6b!important}.globalsearch input.textbox,.newcontent_textcontrol{background-color:#535447!important}.postbit .posttitle,.postbitlegacy .title{border-bottom:1px solid #7c7c6b!important}.textcontrols{border-top:1px solid #214144!important}.signature{border-top:1px solid #7c7c6b!important}#cke_vB_Editor_001_editor,#cke_vB_Editor_QR_editor,.blockhead,.blockrow,.cke_skin_kama{border:none!important}.blockrow{background:#2d2d2d!important}.blockbody{background-color:#2d2d2d!important;color:#eee!important}#pollinfo,.blockhead,.navlinks,.postbody,.toolsmenu{background:#535447!important;border:none!important}.pollsubhead{color:#eee!important}.cke_editor,.cke_wrapper,.popupbody,.postcontainer,.postdetails,.textcontrols,.userinfo{background:#2d2d2d!important}.postcontainer{border:1px solid #2d2d2d!important}.userinfo, .postrow{color:#eee!important}#no-new-message,.popupbody a{background:#2d2d2d!important;color:#eee!important}}
